website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable and well made microfiber duvet cover that is a good value for the cost.
pros: Praised for its attractive design, soft feel, and solid construction, this duvet cover also stands out for washing well and deterring pet fur
cons: A few feel the material is not soft enough, and some reported the material snagging from regular use

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing duvet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing duvet for the price!!!! The quality is good and it so soft! The zipper makes it so easy to put on and it looks great! Again, for the price this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life!
customer_reviews.text: So like a blonde from Fl- I bought a pretty fancy fluffy Calvin Klein feather comforter Little did I know it would make you melt whilst asleep. Well, I went back and bought a WAY cheap one during summer so we do not suffocate in our slumber. I ordered this very very loud Duvet cover from amazon (I don’t do patterns- hate floral etc. Less is more) Today I had the privilege of installing my marshmallow comforter that is like a cloud, and put the loud cover on it! And I love the duvet and want it in black too! Soft and perf. And now I’m exhausted and going to sleep
customer_reviews.author: DolphinJiggy

customer_reviews.title: Not a duvet cover, they're queen bed sheets
customer_reviews.text: This is not a duvet cover, just sheets. I couldn't be more disappointed when I received the package, specially because I don't live in the US so it's difficult for me to return them. Don't buy it if you're looking for a duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella G

customer_reviews.title: Warm covers for the cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I ordered on the Full/Queen size but it's a bummer that it is too big for my queen size comforter - i have at least 7 inches of loose fabric hanging on the sides. It wouldn't work at all even with a full sized comforter -- maybe a twin size is good enough. My comforter also slides inside so I secured it with safety pins at each button at the top (see pic) On the plus side, the color is vibrant and it adds charm to our bedroom. My hubby also noticed that this cover provides more warmth than our regular comforter alone. For the price, I got what I paid for and I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: CerwinaA

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed with this order
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this order. I just received it in the mail today and had planned to give it away as a Christmas gift but I was surprised to find that the pillow cases are a completely different colour grey and different material than the duvet cover!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Finally had time to put it on and i am so disappointed. Its got holes!!! I don't need the hassle so i will just toss it in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: forest f.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this set but the reviews were mostly good so I bought it not expecting much. I am so surprised by this, I'd definitely purchase again. It has a zipper up the side which I really like and little ties in each corner. Would recommend to anyone on a tight budget doing redecorating.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Utopia bedding duvet cover for a summer covering over my bed instead of a heavy quilt. I ordered a king size because we have an extra 3" memory foam pad on our queen size bed and now my queen quilt doesn't cover enough. This product is everything it claims to be. It's true to the fit and held up in the wash and dryer with out shrinking or fading. Cant beat the price either and trust me I've been searching for months and didn't want to spend money on another quilt that didn't fit!
customer_reviews.author: Lunarunner

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! My only issue is the sound the covers make while your tossing and turning. It is definitely because of the material, but I prefer the sounds made over having wrinkles. The claim of these sheets being wrinkle resistant is accepted. I made an error in judgment and ordered king sheets for my queen pillow top mattress. The fit isn't horrible, but there is quite a bit of excess fabric. Will repurchase in a smaller size and different color.
customer_reviews.author: Ashahermosa

customer_reviews.title: Missprinted defects with small tears due to lack of threading. Isn't useable
customer_reviews.text: The duvet cover and pillow cases has the potential to be beautiful and the blue color is very pretty but the set i recieved had a few defects which made the cover and pillow cases impossible to use . The print is all mest up with multiple random thick white lines that doesn't go with the pattern, cutting right across the Design with small tears in the fabric as well like it wasn't sewn together properly with stands of threading missing especially along the white lines of fabric that should not be there. So unfortunately I haven't been able to use it because it would look completely moronic.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fabric, super soft.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I read other reviews about cheap fabric. The seller must have listened, cause this fabric is awesome. Its Super soft and thick enough that you can't see thru it. There were No snaggs, nor loose threads. Very well made. It also has corner ties (holds comforter in place) and a well made strong zipper. I wanna order another king size to make curtains. I'm so in love with this Duvet.
customer_reviews.author: Camille T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set looks great and feels amazing. It's nice, thick, soft material that doesn't feel cheap at all. I love the zipper vs buttons. My old duvet had buttons...never again! I got the navy color in a king size, and it fits perfectly over an ugly green, king sized comforter I own...and you can't see through it at all. Yay! I plan to get the gray set for my sons' room. I'm very happy with this brand and purchase! You can't beat the price. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Duvet that keeps comforter in place!
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is very nice. I don’t use the ties but it stays in place anyway. I liked it so much I bought a second one that is a little lighter in color and the zipper is on the side instead of the bottom but it so well concealed that it doesn’t bother me even though it’s in my side of the bed. Washes up nicely. My husband, who doesn’t like to sleep with a sheet, thought it was great and generally he doesn’t notice or care about things like that.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda S

customer_reviews.title: suprising nice looking for the money
customer_reviews.text: Only cost $15. Not super luxury or anything and there are some minor loose threads and an area where the printing is a bit off as previous reviewers mentioned. But overall very happy with this purchase. It's comfortable and looks nice in the room. For $15 you really can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Kummerfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, for the price this is GREAT!!! It was really easy to put on, and clean. I recommend washing it inside out, and on a delicate cycle. I also hang dry, or if you can't do the just tumble dry on Low or COOL to keep it from shrinking. I didn't have any problems with it. It's thin, but like I said for the price it's amazing! I will be purchasing another from this company for spring!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany N Sousa

customer_reviews.title: SO GLAD I GOT THIS
customer_reviews.text: I just invested in a weighted blanket. THIS duvet cover is so soft yet firm, the heavy blanket slipped right inside with no trouble whatsoever. It matches the sheets and pillow cases perfectly and I am so proud to finally own such nice things. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: mark debrizzi

customer_reviews.title: Love this one!
customer_reviews.text: I recently went out and purchased my first white down comforter. This is something I've wanted for many years and I finally decided to go for it. That being said I also wanted to protect my investment so I immediately began looking for duvet covers. This one was listed at a great price so I decided to give it a try. I was surprised at how smooth and clean the duvet cover feels. I also love the design - simple which is what I like. As long as this one holds up and protects the comforter over the winter I plan on ordering a more fun design in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: SarahK

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good choice, especially for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and couldn't wait to get it on the bed! I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS!!!! It is somewhat wrinkled from the packaging, even though I did do a quick wash and dry. Not extremely lightweight like I was expecting for the price. It isn't the softest, but for a duvet, I would rather it be a little thicker. So, it's soft, yet it seems very durable. And... within minutes of climbing into the freshly made bed, it is confirmed, it IS kitty approved!!!! 👍🏼 I will do an update after we've had it for a bit. :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, certain imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Pros: good price; decent design; two zippers are nice at the bottom Cons: material quality is a bit on the low end; came with a white imperfection/slit on the face (see photo) Washed it twice since purchase and seems to hold color and stitching. A queen duvet cover goes in nicely and two zippers hold it in place. The quality of the ‘build’ feels a bit cheap but overall its a decent cover for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sev S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this. And then buy it for a friend
customer_reviews.text: It did get a tiny snag in the duvet cover almost immediately. But maybe it was from my cat? Either way this set is BEAUTIFUL. I’d buy this over again a million times. I have had no trouble with keeping my conforter staying out in side it. I have a huge fluffy Texas star one that I got as a gift. It started getting piling and making me nuts at night. When I saw the sale and pics I had to give this a try. It’s seriously just so pretty and makes me excited when I come in my room and see it. I bought the sheets to match which also came with 2 pillow cases
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly shocked by just how good this duvet cover is, for the price it's unbeatable. It feels cool and comfortable, definitely not cheap, and the pattern is exactly what I wanted. Couldn't ask for anything more, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jared S.

customer_reviews.title: Very misleading, low quality sheets...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these sheets! I was looking for something with an actual dark NAVY print for a while. Once I opened these sheets I was extremely disappointed. The color was faint with faded random spots as if it had been washed quite a few times. (Possibly a color defect?) the color looks more like a “DARK JEAN” as opposed to a solid navy.. the sheets are practically see-through and super thin compared to others I have purchased through amazon. Overall, I felt that the pictures posted on here were very misleading and I ended up sending them back. Definitely nothing near mediocre to high quality. I guess I will just have to continue my search....
customer_reviews.author: Nikki_Love

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product. Very satisfied,
customer_reviews.text: I bought the king size grey color. Had a couple months so far. It’s great! The fabric is soft, even better quality than I expected for such a good, low price. We really love it. It fits our king size down comforter very well and looks beautiful. It’s got a hidden zipper instead of buttons which I like a lot. It’s a crisp and clean design and definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brandstrom

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this duvet set. It was a little difficult to fit my comforter in it and it kinda doesn't fit the bed as well as I'd hoped. It's a little small. If I had a queen bed I'd order it in a king size. I like that the closure is a zipper rather than the usual buttons but because of the strange way it fits my king bed the zipper ended up being on the side of the bed rather than at the foot. It's no big deal though and for the price it really spiced up my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: JoyDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have to say it is soft but it is an irregular, it has a white line going down the material
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: We love the navy, but the print didn’t match our decor. The quality and feel of this duvet set is soft and high quality. It is honesty an amazing purchase and especially at this price point. We wish the print didn’t overpower the bedroom because this is such a fantastic item at the price point. This is a 5 star quality item. We ordered 2 of the Navy Duvet sets in queen size. We are returning both and are going to order a different duvet aesthetic in hopes to complete our redecorating project.
customer_reviews.author: Happyplanet

customer_reviews.title: We had just gotten a duvet from Lidl and we ...
customer_reviews.text: We had just gotten a duvet from Lidl and we were eager to get a cover. This went above and beyond our expectations! The material is so soft and it fits our king sized duvet perfectly. Unfortunately, our duvet did not come with any string to tie it at the four corners, but this cover does offer strings to allow you to fasten your duvet inside the cover. For the price, this set is a steal!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Consbruck

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and I love that it zips at the bottom. My other one buttons and takes much longer to get closed. Fabric is very light and thin so this is not for warmth. I put a feather comforter inside so no worries for me. Also should not that it is a bit delicate. I have 2 cats and their claws have snagged on this in a couple places so probably not the best for pet owners. I bought this so I could clean my bedding without washing the whole comforter each time. It does wash up very well and the color has stayed true.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I got this during the lightning deal! This is a great bargain. I had 4 kids & I only buy duvets as they are easier to wash in the washing machine. They are also easier to fold & store taking up less space in a linen closet. This patern is modern yet keeps a sophisticated feel. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Florida PlumberTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking comforter and pillow cover. Very soft as well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go over a down queen size down comforter I also bought on Amazon. Very soft and great color. Pattern looks very classy. My dogs love it as well although their fur does show on the dark color. Washed it a few times and still soft and holds up. Zipper is also great
customer_reviews.author: Rafe J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The pattern and color were exactly as pictured. It’s a little thinner than I would prefer for a duvet cover, but for the price it’s about right. I like the zipper closure, it’s easy to use and not super obvious. It does tend to get wrinkly if sat on for any period of time, but the wrinkles usually smooth out after a few hours. Not sure if I’d buy again, would opt to pay a bit more for a thicker cover.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: It isn't as soft as I expected since it is microfiber but it is still okay. It has a sheen on it that almost looks like the color didn't take but it changes with the angle you are looking at it. It does seem to be well made. I was nervous about getting it on my comforter but it wasn't bad. Overall I'm not disappointed. I paid around $18 for it and I think that was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Sowell

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money! EDITED
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these for my Airbnb house. One was missing ties in the corner. They are a great fit, soft and wrinkle free! EDITED I purchased three more sets, and one set had a red dot on the packaging. One of the pillowcases in that package had a stain on it, and was stitched very poorly. Beware of the red dot! It clearly means they sold you something substandard.
customer_reviews.author: CreepingJennie

customer_reviews.title: DON'T LET THE AD FOOL YOU
customer_reviews.text: The ad is nothing like what you will receive. IT'S NOT A COMFORTER, it's a plain thin sheet with two pillow cases that are nothing like the ad, the pillow cases have openings to insert the pillow NOT ON THE BACK OF THE CASE, ON THE SIDE....very disappointed because I already bought the fitted sheet hoping I would get a comforter....NOT A COMFORTER
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: THE DUVET STAINES REALLY BAD. EVERYTHING THAT IS INCLUDING THE NEW COMFORTER I ...
customer_reviews.text: THE DUVET STAINES REALLY BAD. EVERYTHING THAT IS INCLUDING THE NEW COMFORTER I BOUGHT WITH IT IS BLUE. MY PEJAMAS AND MY NAILS ARE ALL BLUE. IT STAINES EVERYTHING. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Alla A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set, especially for the price! After the untimely demise of the really nice set we had, we needed something inexpensive until our American Bully puppy decides she is out of her destructive phase. I figured this would work. I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived. The set is pretty and it’s very soft. The dogs and humans that sleep in the bed all give it 5 stars, and hope that it’s not as fun to destroy as its predecessor was. Unexpected plus was that it doesn’t collect much dog hair due to the texture of the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Katie T.

customer_reviews.title: pretty good duvet for the price
customer_reviews.text: First, the duvet is great looking. No complaints there. I washed it before putting it on and no issues there, either. No loose threads, no unraveling, nothing. It was easy to put on, as it zips open/close. If I had any complaints, it would be that it runs small. I bought the king size cover for my queen sized down comforter (that was bought at Costco), so make sure you pay attention to sizing. I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value!
customer_reviews.text: I love our new duvet cover! It's exactly like the picture. I'm so impressed. It's sturdy, has a zipper, ties to inside corners of your duvet. I paid around $200 for my previous cover. This new one was $14.99 and it's better quality . I will be ordering another very soon. Will recommend to family,friends and anyone looking for a duvet cover. Buy in a couple different colors! (...So you can spruce up your room every once in a while. Change is fun!)
customer_reviews.author: Tinna Long

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect match to the sheet set, but impressive comfort, quality, and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this together with the Utopia Bedding 4 Piece Bed Sheet Set in the same pattern. Overall, I love the quality, the comfort, and the price. However, this set and the bed sheet set were slightly different shades of gray--this one was slightly lighter than the sheet set. Not a deal-breaker by any means, but be forewarned that the two together will not be a perfectly matched set. It might be wiser to go with a plain sheet set instead to avoid the slightly clashing color difference.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful value
customer_reviews.text: The color is rich and the fabric feels very nice. It's a zipper closure, so there are no strings or buttons to mess with, the zipper is tucked under a fold of cloth so it isn't exposed. It fit was and looks great. It's great quality for the price and I am extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this because we have six furry kids and wanted a duvet that was cheap so that I didn’t care if it got ruined. WELL, it’s held up great! I’ve had it for about 4 months now, have had to wash it at least 10 times and it looks just like the day I bought it. It is very thin and is very staticky. I live in Wisconsin and we’re just coming out of winter. I will definitely be buying this again when it gets worn
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Frank

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a King size bed.
customer_reviews.text: What I like: 1. I love the color and pattern. What I don't like: 1. It's too small, barely covers the top of my mattress. I have a King so I ordered a King. I have it turned sideways on the bed, which messes with the look, and it still doesn't cover the sides and doesn't reach the top. 2. I don't have a duvet in it yet which will make it smaller. So much potential with this set. Not sure what I will do with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Murrah

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertized
customer_reviews.text: I have the king version in grey and LOVE it. I ordered the queen in blue for the guest room because based on the description, it's supposed to be the same. It looks like the picture and the packaging is microfiber but it feels and looks like different fabric than the microfiber one I have in my bedroom... the queen one I received looks and feels like like regular cotton. It wasn't expensive, so I didn't feel like going through the return process, but the microfiber was ordered to minimize the cat hair that usually sticks to the cover, so I'm dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - has orange blotches
customer_reviews.text: There were dirty orange spots on the pillow shams when I opened the package. Not sure what this is but looks like color is fading or rust. This should not happen as it's supposed to be new.
customer_reviews.author: tifa3

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this duvet cover set. It's really pretty and it is comfortable, however, it's really slippery, so you have to tie the duvet to the inside or it will slip out or roll around inside it. The cover does come with little ties in the corners so you can tie the duvet to it, but the ties are small and then you have these lumps in the corners where you tied it down.
customer_reviews.author: AZDane

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Instead of buying a new comforter, I put ours into this. The colors didn't go with our new theme so this was a perfect way to continue to use it yet change it's look. It's very soft. Instead each corner are ties so you can tie it to your comforter, keeping it spread out inside. I love the design and color.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hough

customer_reviews.title: I honestly really love this set
customer_reviews.text: I honestly really love this set. It's really pretty (we got the grey and white.) It's also super soft - but I like the microfiber stuff rather than cotton. It's not good quality, be aware of that - as the price reflects. However, if it lasts me a year, I am happy with it. We have animals and kids so we do not buy expensive things. I also like to change things up a lot. So this is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: maribeth

customer_reviews.title: Updated review after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Update: I wrote my initial review a bit too soon after purchase. While we do like the material and pattern of this set, the dimensions of the duvet are wonky and there is a lot of excess material that ends up on one edge that makes it difficult to neatly make the bed. This aspect got progressively annoying as time went by. Probably would not purchase again in King, though I can't speak to other sizes. May 2016: This is a great set - I also bought the sheets that go with it. The colors are vibrant and the material soft. Wonderfully lightweight for the warmer months. Really gave a boost to the whole bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Pluviophile

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Slippery Material
customer_reviews.text: It's just not good. Duvet insert keeps slipping and slide inside even though all the sides are tied, and it just doesn't breathe. There is a difference between warmth and suffocation. There's nothing like cotton for comforters.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva

customer_reviews.title: Nice with a pinch of ugh
customer_reviews.text: Received this duvet cover set yesterday. So far I love it, as it's soft and vibrant. I washed it straight away so I could use it and was a little nervous that it would fade or bleed as it was a deep navy. But it didn't. Yay! There were a few slight annoyances though.... there was a small tear in the middle of the cover so I had to turn that side down and the pattern goes the wrong way if the buttoned end goes at the foot of the bed as it's supposed to. Minor details considering the price, but still frustrating. I may update this review if things change after 2nd wash.
customer_reviews.author: MommaOf2

customer_reviews.title: Different colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought one set and decided 2 days later to buy a second , I recieved them both within a day from each other which was great however. They are 2 different shades which doesnt help when they're on the same bed you can tell. Not happy about this at all. It's very noticeable to the naked eye tried getting pictures of how different they are in shade but doesn't do it justice. Reason why we have 2 on same bed is my husband likes a heavier down comforter than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Rethier

customer_reviews.title: I really love it especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought the grey lattice pattern set. I really love it especially for the price. It has the corner ties even though they are kind of weak but most high end covers don't even have ties. The enclosure is a zipper something I have never encountered before on a duvet cover, I like it though. The fabric is not to light or to heavy it is very soft to the touch and I even enjoy snuggling up with the pillow shams on my pillows. I am pleased I took a chance on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darthmadonna

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2... Both were different??
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows the points going head to foot on pillow cases & cover. Mine were side to side on both : ( even the picture I the package shows the pattern the other direction. It just doesn't look right But I'm keeping it anyway because if I exchange will probably be the same issue. Material is nice & it fits well. Just looks slightly off due to pattern being sideways. ***I ordered a second set hoping the 1st was just a dud. The 2nd set is also sewn to be displayed sideways & the new cover is a button & the 1st was a nice zipper... I'm not happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Plowman

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about ordering a $15 duvet cover, but I am so glad I ordered this one! The color is vibrant and the zipper is perfect. I would highly recommend this item. It was actually recommended to me by a friend who previously purchased the white duvet cover and it is great. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: djmanan8

customer_reviews.title: NOT COLOR SAFE! WILL TRANSFER
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this item. I ordered the navy and white, and as soon as I opened the package, it was discolored. The blue had transferred onto the white!! It hadn't even been washed yet!! Straight out of the package! I went ahead and washed it in ice cold water, with color care detergent. Now I have a navy and baby blue duvet. It's not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered the blue one and .,,Simply amazing for the price. It really changed the look of my room and I will order another color for the summer. It’s soft and the color is very bright. I then ordered the grey one and complete night stained ... see the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Angel Ford

customer_reviews.title: Not soft and way to big purchased a queen and received a king
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to get all the patterns matching and no stains or tips, but there was alot of threads sticking out of seams and the fabric was not soft at all plus I ordered a queen size cover and the package said queen size but what I got inside was for a King not a queen size. Very frustrating having alot of excess fabric/room way to big and my duvet moves all over the place. I need it now so I cant return it won't be buying from them again
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Durability?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this duvet over a month ago, but I just opened it today only to discover that the stitches on three out of for are frayed. It as if they were ripped from the machine. Unfortunately, it's to late to return. I really like the print and the fabric feels durable; nevertheless, the poor stitching might negate the durability of the duvet.
customer_reviews.author: Cholyn

customer_reviews.title: Up at night
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, feels ok, the issue I have is the noise this thing makes! It sounds like you are moving a tarp every time you move a part of your body. Every time my husband rolls over I wake up. It’s so weird, I didn’t realize a cover could sound so plastic.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really love this set and the only reason why i would give it 4 stars is because 1 came with a stain that I have to return. Great quality, no wrinkling!!! Looks amazing all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: Peaches Magoo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize it was used until I put it over my duvet. There are stains allover this thing. Strings are coming out. The zipper also sticks very bad. If it was brand new and no issues, I’d still only give it a 3star bc it has no buttons,ties, anything on the inside for the comforter to attach to. Not very soft either.
customer_reviews.author: L.stan

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this duvet cover. I had to buy this as a replacement because my dog chewed the zipper off the other one beyond repair. It is easy to put on the duvet and remove for washing. Recommendation: if washing with other items, wash with the zipper closed so the other items don't end up hiding inside of the cover. Not a fault of the product, just a hazard of having a duvet and cover.
customer_reviews.author: NikNik

customer_reviews.title: But it looks nice on the bed
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at how small a package this came in. But overall it seems to be what it says it is. It is not of high quality, quality at less than $20 is rare. And I did not expect that. But it looks nice on the bed. My queen pillows fit in the shams. The lightweight comforter cover and fit on my bed perfectly. The surface of the cover is somewhat slick and I don't much like that. I like things that are cozy and warm. Not so much interested in lying on plastic Visqueen. But it will serve for now, until I can afford an actual hand made quilted cotton comforter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kadinger

customer_reviews.title: Love it but the zipper is on the side
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover for the price and so far, no issues with the duvet bunching up or shifting inside. My one complaint is that like others have said, the zipper is on the side instead of the bottom which is just weird. If this were fixed I would give 5 stars. Regardless, for this price I will probably end up ordering another in a different print.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCampsters

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! Haven’t washed it yet so I don’t know if it bleeds but this duvet is super durable. I have 2 large dogs and 2 cats and they haven’t torn it to pieces nor has the zipper pulled apart. As for versatility? It’s a duvet. So I’m pretty sure it only has one purpose. The pattern is on both sides of the cover so whichever way you make your bed it’s the same pattern sideways and upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely duvet cover, just update the strings to velcro, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the ties on the inside of the Duvet cover were snaps or even velcro. The small ties are hard to tie most often. Snaps or velcro would eliminate so much of the time consuming tying. Please change the tiny ties. Hell, even make the strings itself longer!
customer_reviews.author: kassie907

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT SO MUCH - I BOUGHT ANOTHER ONE!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this duvet cover. It is sheet-like material that is very sturdy and looks great! It's easy to wash and is very durable! We had our first one for several months and decided to purchase another one ..... so if this one ever wears out, we will have a back up! Did I mention that the price is fantastic too?!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well spent money
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good I want expecting much for the price but to change the bedding colors and to my surprise this duvet cover is soft and wrinkle free I will say tho one of the pillow covers is a complete different color than the other
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR HOT CLIMATES LIKE HAWAII !!
customer_reviews.text: Being stationed in Hawaii, it’s way too hot for a blanket & using just a sheet is too flimsy. I know it’s a duvet cover but I use it without putting anything in the duvet cover & it makes for the perfect “blanket” (not too flimsy like a sheet & not thick/hot like a blanket lol) since my apartment only has a fan and no A/C. Super soft too!
customer_reviews.author: James Collier

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter for the price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to stage our bedroom for showing our home. Since we were moving and planning to buy new furniture and have new colors in the new home, I didn't want to spend a lot of money on bedding. The color is exactly as shown and the set did make our bed look nice. The only issue I have with it is that it can be difficult to get the comforter to stay put in the cover. My husband moves around a lot while sleeping and I have to readjust and sometimes retie the corners of the comforter in the duvet cover since he pulls his side around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: KimP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing  cover
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit skeptical about the price because 18 $ for a down comforder cover is a great price. It was delivered very fast and the material is so soft you don't want to leave it in the morning. The size is perfect and you can tie it in place so you don't have troubles with reareging the comforder in the corners .I will highly recommend it. The best value, best material ,best product
customer_reviews.author: Cobzaru Mihaela

customer_reviews.title: The pattern does not go the same direction as the picture
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I ordered this set. Most of them were positive. But the pattern goes the wrong way if you put the buttons at the top. You have to put the buttons on the side & it's a little bigger than my down comforter, so it doesn't fit quite right. But if you put the buttons on the side (pattern like the pictures), then the pillow shams still go the opposite direction. So you can't get the patterns going the same way as the picture and have them match. The material is light weight and fairly soft though. It's ok for the price as a backup set, but I was kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Needs

customer_reviews.title: they feel just like a rain coat
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this are not actually full duvets cover... They are just covers, you will need to add cushion or leave it as a blanket. Also, they feel just like a rain coat. Not comfortable at all. This product needs to be more specific about this product. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Costumer

customer_reviews.title: Mikey Likes It - This Set Hit the Spot
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in the mail today, and I love it. The pattern is classic, but feels modern and masculine. The material is soft, and it has a zipper on the end (which I much prefer over buttons). Folks who take selfies in the bedroom will never have to wonder if their bedding is sending the wrong signals. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Blue Eyes

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I expected the material to be low grade but I didn't expect it to bunch and visibly stretch and just generally annoy me. I tried washing it a couple times to let it "break in" but no luck. It was on my sons bed less than a month before I gave it away. Really disappointed because I love the pattern!
customer_reviews.author: MrsI

customer_reviews.title: we LOVE it! The duvet fit perfectly with a little ...
customer_reviews.text: SO SOFT!!! I washed it as soon as it came. The fold lines came out but it still has a little wrinkling. However, we LOVE it! The duvet fit perfectly with a little room so it wasn't super tight. We buttoned the buttons "inside-out" like it came to keep the duvet inside. The duvet itself does fall to the end if our kids are moving it and after we wake up, but my husband is going to insert grommets on each end of the duvet and the duvet cover and we'll tie ribbons on the ends to keep the two pieces together. I'm extremely pleased with the set and even ordered an extra set of sheets from this company.
customer_reviews.author: BetJett

customer_reviews.title: A pillow case for your cover
customer_reviews.text: So I’m pleased I guess for what it’s worth, I was initially disappointed but that was my fault as I didn’t know what a duvet cover was, I just assumed it was a fancy name for a cover. So when I ordered 2 and it came in this small box I was like how the heck can 2 king size comforters fit in that box. I soon found out what a duvet was... a cover for a cover.. pretty stupid if you ask me, it’s like a pillow case for your cover... I ended up putting my queen comforter in it... it keeps me pretty warm surprisingly, the color is vibrant and the material seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Zainab Abdulerahmaan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and cute
customer_reviews.text: Really great buy! I am moving into my first apartment and I needed something to tie in all of my decor. This thing is adorable and amazing quality for the price! I'm not sure why other reviews are so low, but I was really pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kailynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Duvet Cover
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this duvet cover and the quality of the material and the pattern. I like that it is a heavier weight fabric as I have cats in my home and it holds up well to their claws. I love the navy color and it just so happens to match the same color of curtains I have, so I am thrilled about that!
customer_reviews.author: Debora Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a very cheap set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I wanted something cheap but still good looking set for my guest bedroom. I am happy I did this purchase. The softness and the quality is good for a set of this price. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning! Great find
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Very nice for the money! I ordered a King and Queen in grey for our son! The Fabric seems sturdy and pretty wrinkle free from the package. I did not iron it. The picture was taken right from the package! It’s a nice navy blue navy not a black navy. :) I Will be ordering more. I filled it with our current summer comforter. This king seems big enough to accommodate a thicker “winter” comforter. Using my thin comforter left plenty of room 4- to 6 inches on both sides. Hope this helps. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: ILC

customer_reviews.title: Nice and great pattern.
customer_reviews.text: We have dogs that like to sleep on the bed, so I have to wash the bedding frequently. I love this set, but the king doesn't fit my king size alt down comforter, leaving it a bit lumpy with not the amount of edge to cover the sides of the bed like I would like, but overall, it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE D.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent!
customer_reviews.text: The material is quiet loud when you toss and turnnif that makes sense but it did fit my comforter nicely and it held up in the washer and dryer. It had a button closure. Maybe ties would have also been helpful in not allowing the comforter to bunch up inside. Either way it’s not terrible. I can deal with the sound, it’s easy to clean and comes clean nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Cassie Buchert

customer_reviews.title: very cute and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I needed a little change in my bedroom and this Duvet cover and pillow shams were the perfect choice, very affordable and cute! the material is very thin so its hard to keep my feather blanket in place but it works great for now
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: The price is right, the material are nice soft and the colors are great. I have been buying duvet cover form stores and it cost about three times as much and materia is same and less the pillow cover. It is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Coloring Bleeds Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful color and pattern, but beware: The blue will bleed everywhere every time you wash it! We wash in cold water and still, the blue stains all over the white of the design. Have washed it abour 10 times now and it is somehow still bleeding! The material is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Reviews

customer_reviews.title: While the item itself is great, super soft and great cover for the Duvet ...
customer_reviews.text: While the item itself is great, super soft and great cover for the Duvet - the color Grey was ordered - the color in person does not match that of a dark grey- it has a green tint to it that is not horrible - but it's just not the shade of grey that is pictured - and up to the set of grey sheets that were purchased at the same time, you can see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: TiaAnder

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and extremely
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and extremely, satisfyingly comfortable duvet set. It's smooth to the touch, easy to assemble, and does not ruffle or make an extreme amount of noise when moved. I've been in love with it since it showed up on my doorstep and then onto my bed. I would definitely recommend this set. ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Schiller

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Not as soft as usual microfiber
customer_reviews.text: Price and style are both great. However other similar covers have had a much softer feel-this one has more of a polyester sound and feel than other microfiber duvet covers I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: jpreader

customer_reviews.title: Will not work on a weighted blanket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking I could put my new weighted blanket in it but I was wrong. Very, very wrong. The color is great, the fabric feels very nice so this would be great for its original purpose. Just don't bother trying it with a weighted blanket. You'll end up with a huge heavy ball of a blanket inside a duvet cover mess.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine R. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Larger than described
customer_reviews.text: I had to wash this product as soon as I opened it because it smelled so terrible. It was FAR larger than my queen-sized weighted blanket so it looked like a lumpy mess. The strings on the inside attaching the cover to the blanket all broke off rendering the product useless.
customer_reviews.author: cfull13

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The fitted sheet fits my bed perfectly it doesn’t come up off of the edge and my mattress is a 10 inch the comforter fits like a supposed to and so does the flat sheets and I bought a queen size for those that are wondering I’d definitely buy it again oh and the color did not fade when I washed it
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Poor seaming/stitching
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that this duvet cover was cheaply and poorly stitched together. It appears it will not be a product providing longevity. I included photos of what I’m speaking of. The seams are very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Morethanamommy

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality for something so cheap
customer_reviews.text: I love it.there are ties on the inside corners, but they were flimsy and easily snapped. However, you can sew them back on and changing duvet is a snap. The zipper has not snagged yet, holds up well despite being so cheap!and the fabric is soooo crisp and smooth!very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: nichole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the grey set about 6 months ago. I wanted to see how they held up before I reviewed them. I was a little disappointed with the color when I originally got them. Mine came as more of a pewter instead of grey. But as I accessorized, it looked great. They are soft and wrinkle free. I washed them 3 times so far and the color has not faded. It’s a great buy for the price. I’d recommend this set to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: King Size Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get my order! Honestly i had no idea what i was buying, I thought i was buying a comforter 🤷🏽‍♀️ When i figured out how it worked....I don’t think i could have been more satisfied with the product. The quality of the material is A+. If you are a Duvet virgin....try this one!
customer_reviews.author: MrsD

customer_reviews.title: Cheap things are not good and good things are not cheap!
customer_reviews.text: It looked as discribed, it's a bit cheap, threads were coming out soon as I opened it to look at it. It was a gift I don't think my daughter cares that it's coming apart. But I do . It's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kim foster MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Better than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Very warm & soft duvet...love the fact that it is spill-stain resistant...Because duvets are somewhat lighter in weight than the traditional comforter, my boyfriend was initially disappointed. But the micro-fiber really does contain your body heat resulting in the same warmth as heavier bedding. We're both quite pleased...And the design is modern yet classy...2 thumbs up, for sure...
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this duvet cover. The fabric is extra soft and smooth, and it seems like it won't fade with multiple washings. I especially love the price, which is 1/3 the cost of most duvet covers sold in stores. The fabric is very thin - like a sheet, so if you are looking for something thick and bulky, this is not it. This duvet cover is 100% worth the price, and I would order it again in a heartbeat. I only wish I had purchased it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very good bedding
customer_reviews.text: I love these duvets... Super value for the money. Gave it 4 stars because it is like a magnet to the animal hair and I have to change it every 3 days, but I won’t stop using it!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding 3-Piece Duvet Cover Set – 1 Duvet Cover with 2 Pillow Shams - Soft Brushed Microfiber Fabric - Shrinkage and Fade Resistant - Easy Care (Queen, Quatrefoil Grey)
feature_bullets: DUVET COVER SET - Includes a duvet cover measuring 90 by 90 inches with a zippered closure, 2 pillowcases (shams) measuring 20 by 26 inches with a 2 inches flange which adds classic decorative accent to the pillow shams; (COMFORTER SOLD SEPARATELY)
BRUSHED MICROFIBER - The brushed microfiber fabric makes them soft, breathable, iron easy, wrinkle free and fade resistant and protects against any shrinkage after washing
DURABLE - The high tensile strength makes it strong, durable and less likely to rip or tear
PERFECTLY SEWN CLOSURE - The closure is sewn to perfection to secure the comforter in place
EASY CARE - Machine wash with like colors and tumble dry on low heat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars6,851 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
